title: Help me ID this font :)
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003302im_/http:/typophile.com/files/anchor_3827.png)

The one at the top i need to know the font used or something similar.

Thanks guys :)
author: dandanthedan

comments.content: See [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003302/http:/typophile.com/node/108180) for the answer. Should be [Brasserie](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003302/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wilton/brasserie).
oohhh! there is already an answer for that! thanks so much! :)
